name: PRINT ALL
description: If you want to be able to print CR or LF characters to the screen and not go to the next line then set this option to ON.

parameters.name: ON/OFF
parameters.description: ON/OFF - Required - If ON the program will treat CR and LF characters as though they were normal, displayable characters. To return to the normal process this should be OFF.

comments:
You will probably never have the need for this command since in almost every case you want the
program to move the display to the next line when a CR/LF is encountered. If this option is ON, the
